Uses of Package
org.netbeans.api.sendopts

  • Packages that use org.netbeans.api.sendopts 
    Package Description
    org.netbeans.api.sendopts
    Start here if you are in a standalone application and you want to parse a command line using the sendopts infrastructure.
    org.netbeans.spi.sendopts
    Package for those that want to write a command line handler that can participate on handling parts of a command line send to the application.
  • Classes in org.netbeans.api.sendopts used by org.netbeans.api.sendopts 
    Class and Description
    CommandException
    Signals that something is wrong when processing the command line arguments.
    CommandLine
    A class for clients that have an array of strings and want to process it - e.g.
  • Classes in org.netbeans.api.sendopts used by org.netbeans.spi.sendopts 
    Class and Description
    CommandException
    Signals that something is wrong when processing the command line arguments.
